name: HIV/HCV Programs
description: Shanti's HIV Programs exist to ensure that underserved people living with HIV and/or HCV in San Francisco receive the compassionate, culturally competent support they need to manage their health and well-being. Shanti's HIV Programs offer nonjudgmental, harm-reduction based services that promote robust engagement by clients in their own healthcare. Their services allow individuals to connect with one another and overcome barriers to access much-needed resources, including medical and mental heal
